hero.title: Ostinuto
hero.subtitle: Ostinuto is a fully offline music player with playlists, shuffle, queueing, infinite loop mode, background playback, and built-in recording with waveform visualization.

features.label: Looping
features.subtitle: Repeat indefinitely
features.text: Turn on loop for any track and it will repeat indefinitely, with no recommendations or auto-generated queues.

features.label: Easy Listening
features.subtitle: Fast track management
features.text: Manage tracks quickly with swipe gestures: swipe left to queue or edit, and swipe right to delete.

features.label: Organization
features.subtitle: Find and structure your sound
features.text: Create playlists for sleep, focus, practice, or any routine, and use search to quickly find and organize tracks your way.

features.label: Recording
features.subtitle: Capture loops and notes
features.text: Record your own loops, notes, or ambient sounds and save them as tracks you can play and organize.

features.label: Customization
features.subtitle: Make it yours
features.text: Choose themes, set separate light/dark themes, and fine-tune track details so everything is easy to recognize at a glance.

features.label: Data
features.subtitle: Manage your data and export and restore anytime
features.text: Create full backups of your entire library (playlists, notes, thumbnails, recordings, and audio files), restore anytime, or export a single playlist to share or archive.
